pages.title: The Mailbox
pages.text: The mailbox is used to send and receive mail.$(br2)You can receive:$(br)$(li)$(l:getting_started/mailbox_contracts)Contracts$(/l)$(li)Rewards for completed contracts$(li)$(l:advanced_delivery/computer#minternet)Orders$(/l)$(br2)It is also used to send $(l:packaging/envelope)Envelopes$(/l) and $(l:packaging/parcel)Parcels$(/l)$(br2)The mailbox gets emptied every day at 6AM.
You will receive a mailbox once you created a $(l:getting_started/groups)group$(/l).
You can have multiple mailboxes at the same time. The inbox is synchronized across all mailboxes of the group.
